news_header: A$AP Rocky was acquitted in a high-profile assault trial, with Rihanna supporting him throughout the proceedings.
news_original_title: Five things we learned at the A$AP Rocky trial
news_text: A$AP Rocky's felony assault trial in Los Angeles ended with his acquittal after three weeks of testimony. Rihanna supported him during the trial, and the couple celebrated the verdict together. The trial highlighted tensions within the A$AP Mob and featured dramatic courtroom moments, including personal attacks between attorneys.
